mapper.select: select priority_order_cd , priority_order_name,create_time,author_cd from planocycle.priority_order_mst where company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and deleteflg=0 and author_cd = #{authorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by priority_order_cd
select priority_order_cd as priorityOrderCd, priority_order_name as priorityOrderName from planocycle.priority_order_mst where company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT product_power_cd,array_to_string(array_agg(shelf_pattern_cd),',') as shelf_pattern_cd FROM planocycle.priority_order_mst mst inner join planocycle.priority_order_pattern pat on mst.priority_order_cd=pat.priority_order_cd where mst.priority_order_cd =#{priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by product_power_cd
mapper.insert: insert into planocycle.priority_order_mst (company_cd, priority_order_cd, priority_order_name, product_power_cd) values (#{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{priorityOrderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productPowerCd,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select count(*) from planocycle.priority_order_mst where priority_order_name=#{priorityOrderName} and priority_order_cd=#{priorityOrderCd}
